49546.affected_area: Williams Lake, 100 Mile House, Prince George, Quesnel
live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your continued patience.
We have been able to restore service to many of the affected customers, but due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to completely resolve.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
49546.summary: Customers in Williams Lake, 100 Mile House, Prince George, & surrounding areas are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49546.title: May 16 - Williams Lake, 100 Mile House, Prince George, Quesnel, & Surrounding Areas | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
